title: Building Your Brand: Leadership to Shape, Share, and Remember with Jason L. Meriwether
desc: Emerging Perspectives in  Student Affairs Leadership  Lecture Series Presents:  Jason L. Meriwether, Vice Chancellor for Enrollment Management and Student Affairs, Indiana University Southeast Higher education leaders are inundated by numerous theories positing methods to lead within a complex organization, while choices about leadership style are equally broad and varied.? This energizing and informative session will challenge participants to design a consistent message about leadership that is robust with substance and strategy, yet attentive to personal style.? Attendees will be engaged to look introspectively at strengths and opportunities to grow, while building an individual leadership brand that will flourish in the campus community and for the duration of their career.
